attributes.action: Remove the primary residence from inheritance tax calculations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow parents to pass on the family home without the need to sell just to pay the tax bill.  All other liquid assets to remain within an index-linked cut-off.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Remove the primary residence from inheritance tax calculations."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14673.asp

Prime Minister's Office
